title: Field Remedy: 1725
subject:
Engine Z20LET - Poly-V-belt comes off /
tears
cause:
On Speester Z20LET without A/C an idler is
installed instead of the A/C compressor. The idler bracket design
causes an incorrect Poly-V- belt alignment.
production:
Implementation of a modified pulley bracket
(moving the belt forward by 3.6mm) as of the following
VIN/Engine-no.: BP: W0L0EBR973N007200 Engine-no.: Z20LET31024880;
Date: 19.11.2003
